summary.vendorDescription: There are few weapons that Banshee-44 has not seen, and fewer still that he cannot fix.
summary.factionDescription: Field-test Foundry weapons to place additional Armsday orders.

categories.overlayDescription: What you did at the Array could change our future.
You fought bravely on the Moon.
Choose a weapon. You've earned it.

1469714392.bucketDescription: Supplies and materials used in the field.

2689798308.bucketDescription: The currency of the City. A programmable matter used as a source of power before the Collapse. Glimmer is shared between all your characters.

3865314626.bucketDescription: Useful for equipment upgrades and more.

1498876634.bucketDescription: Auto rifles, pulse rifles, scout rifles, and hand cannons.

2465295065.bucketDescription: Shotguns, fusion rifles, and sniper rifles.

705234570.itemDescription: A Ghost telemetry link that accelerates the development of your upgradeable Primary weapons. Lasts 30 minutes.

3159615086.itemDescription: The currency of the City. A programmable matter used as a source of power before the Collapse. Glimmer is shared between all your characters.

1898539128.displaySource: Acquired from the Gunsmith or dismantled weapons.

3371478409.itemDescription: A Ghost telemetry link that accelerates the development of your upgradeable Special weapons. Lasts 30 minutes.

2929837733.itemDescription: A Ghost telemetry link that accelerates the development of your upgradeable Heavy weapons. Lasts 30 minutes.

928169143.itemDescription: Single-use Ghost manufacturing package. Instantly replenish special weapon ammunition.

211861343.itemDescription: Single-use Ghost manufacturing package. Instantly replenish heavy weapon ammunition.

2595349102.itemDescription: Clear skies. Tall grass. Open space. Perfect shot.

3904035637.itemDescription: Some minds are a palace. Others, a prison. A Warlock's is both.

1793886019.itemDescription: The subtle alignments of Light and power converge in your hand.

2134555146.itemDescription: Can not the smallest particle menace the greatest warrior?

677734480.itemDescription: Omolon prototype. Use in the Crucible to gather data for Omolon's weapons developers.

2245649823.itemDescription: Omolon prototype. Use against Vex targets to gather data for Omolon's weapons developers.

2476342662.itemDescription: Suros prototype. Use in the Crucible to gather data for the Suros research department.

2545611811.itemDescription: Hkke prototype. Score Crucible kills with this weapon to gather data for Hkke's armament scientists.

718379268.itemDescription: Omolon prototype. Use in the Crucible to gather data for Omolon's weapons developers.

2931051629.itemDescription:
An order for a SUROS PDX-41 Pulse Rifle.

Foundry orders are delivered via the Gunsmith on Armsday, which occurs every Wednesday.

1077326550.itemDescription:
An order for a SUROS JLB-42 Rocket Launcher.

Foundry orders are delivered via the Gunsmith on Armsday, which occurs every Wednesday.

2639777407.itemDescription:
An order for a SUROS JLB-47 Rocket Launcher.

Foundry orders are delivered via the Gunsmith on Armsday, which occurs every Wednesday.

915115332.itemDescription:
An order for a Hkke Strongbow-D Shotgun.

Foundry orders are delivered via the Gunsmith on Armsday, which occurs every Wednesday.

568506537.itemDescription:
An order for a Hkke Tamar-D Sniper Rifle.

Foundry orders are delivered via the Gunsmith on Armsday, which occurs every Wednesday.

368428387.statDescription: Higher Attack allows your weapons to damage higher-level opponents.

4284893193.statDescription: The number of shots per minute this weapon can fire.

4043523819.statDescription: Increases the damage inflicted by each round.

1240592695.statDescription: Increases the effective range of this weapon.

155624089.statDescription: Decreases weapon recoil when fired continuously.

4188031367.statDescription: Decreases the time it takes to reload this weapon.

3871231066.statDescription: The number of shots which can be fired before reloading.

2961396640.statDescription: Rate at which the weapon charges.

3614673599.statDescription: Increases the explosion radius of this weapon.

2523465841.statDescription: Increases the speed of projectiles fired by this weapon.

2391494160.statDescription: Light increases your level, increasing the damage your abilities deal against higher-level enemies.

1931675084.statDescription: How much space the weapon occupies in the inventory.

943549884.statDescription: The speed with which the weapon can be readied and aimed.

1345609583.statDescription: The weapon's ability to augment your aim.

2715839340.statDescription: The weapon's tendency to move while firing.

192233393.displayDescription: Increases the reload speed of this weapon when its mag is empty.

3464328064.displayDescription: This weapon gains bonus damage when three or more enemies are in close proximity.

3283108368.displayDescription: Kills with this weapon reduce the cooldown of your grenade.

3102938162.displayDescription: This weapon gains improved range and handling for a short time after revival.

318657130.displayDescription: This weapon gains increased reload and handling when two or more enemies are in close proximity.

1900693659.displayDescription: Quick unassisted kills with this weapon reduce grenade and melee cooldown.

4023922623.displayDescription: Rapidly landing precision hits will return one round to the magazine.

1026458383.displayDescription: Kills with this weapon while critically wounded have a chance to start regenerating health.

3523239750.displayDescription: This weapon handles and reloads faster when the wielder is the last living player of their Fireteam.

3848963378.displayDescription: Chance to return a portion of the magazine after an assist.

3119194123.displayDescription: The bottom half of each magazine causes additional damage.

3877389831.displayDescription: Reduces the severity of this weapons recoil.

972070082.displayDescription: This weapon gains a boost to range and handling when health is low.

3722223157.displayDescription: This weapon becomes more accurate as your health gets lower.

1258704074.displayDescription: Chance to refill this weapon's magazine when critically wounded.

3133914358.displayDescription: This weapon grows more accurate the longer it is fired.

2725595956.displayDescription: Kills with this weapon grant a brief boost to the sprint's top speed.

597127202.displayDescription: Aiming this weapon increases its effective range.

2028552052.displayDescription: Reloading this weapon after a kill grants a damage bonus for a short time.

2507926095.displayDescription: This weapon gains better target acquisition.

2814215427.displayDescription: This weapon has bonus accuracy while firing from the hip.

2450150110.displayDescription: Kills with this weapon grant bonus damage for a short time.

731752060.displayDescription: Kills with this weapon increase reload speed for a short time.

1029160485.displayDescription: Melee kills increase the reload speed of this weapon for a short time.

77746637.displayDescription: Kills with this weapon grant enhanced motion tracker resolution for a short time.

2421244048.displayDescription: Readying this weapon grants a brief period of bonus accuracy.

4198986151.displayDescription: Precision kills with this weapon dramatically increase reload speed.

3031234337.displayDescription: Increased accuracy, handling and damage resistance when shooting this weapon from behind cover.

1275958706.displayDescription: Missing a shot from this weapon's burst will fire a fourth shot.

661681055.displayDescription: Body shots with this weapon increase precision damage for a short time.

2047535886.displayDescription: Short period of 25% bonus melee damage after landing a hit with this weapon.

3661306029.displayDescription: This weapon's magazine will be refilled whenever you unleash your Super.

4266524967.displayDescription: Melee kills while this weapon is equipped have a chance to refill the magazine.

2290550941.displayDescription: Aiming this weapon increases its effective range.

1566222180.displayDescription: This weapon can be fired in full auto mode.

2626112550.displayDescription: It's easier to aim under fire using this weapon.

3911170550.displayDescription: Precision kills with this weapon cause the target to explode.

824061322.displayDescription: Missing a shot has a chance to return ammo directly to the magazine.

1568304667.displayDescription: One random bullet in the magazine causes considerable bonus damage.

3752206822.displayDescription: The last round in a magazine deals bonus damage.

3052118152.displayDescription: Reloading this weapon has a chance to grant a larger than normal magazine.
